column17:
Ed Hardy EDP - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2438

Inspired by the trendy and dramatic tattoo art from the eponymous brand of Don Ed Hardy the tantalizing fruity effect of Ed Hardy for Women unveils a provocative aura of edginess. Perfect for the young at heart this playful Eau de Perfume was created by Christian Audigier as a signature perfume. Heady and addictive this luxury perfume is for a woman of charm and resolve.

The fresh aroma of mango and red grapefruit blend in with the creaminess of apple souffle and the zest of wild strawberry to create a top note. This makes for a perfect preview to a floral heart note of freesia moist muguet and a whiff of linden blossom. The warm base note of amber tonka bean and silken vanilla is artfully fused with musk which provides a sensual and earthy undertone to this enticing concoction. Enclosed in a rock-and-roll themed bottle Ed Hardy for Women is a psychedelic explosion of aromas which please as much as they stimulate.

column17:
Ed Hardy Love & Luck Eau de Parfum - 50 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.1710

Scintillating and essentially feminine this luxury scent exudes a delicate and refreshing aroma that is laden with the choicest of natures bounty. Ed Hardy Love & Luck represents the unconscious charm of the woman who is the subject of adulation and blessed with good fortune. Created by perfumer Adriana Medina this delightful Eau de Parfum is made for the edgy brand of Ed Hardy.

The top note opens with a pleasant mix of fresh hints of bergamot along with sweet and juicy notes of blood orange. Trailing into the heart of the fragrance you can take in tart hints of blackcurrant exotic jasmine luscious notes of plum peachy hints of nectarine and dusted with distinct traces of pink pepper. The base note is a balmy union of soothing musk warm notes of cedar rich sandalwood and earthy hints of patchouli. Redolent with delicate and fragrant scent threads that weaves together a beguiling floral fruity fragrance that adds a delightful nuance to your attire any time you choose to don it. This lovely fragrance comes encased in an eye-catching bottle that attracts second glances. The simple cylindrical shape comes in sharp contrast with the brilliantly coloured illustration of a beautiful geisha resplendent in her traditional finery. A refreshing fragrance Ed Hardy Love & Luck shrouds you in a bold and intoxicating aura.
